data.title: Welcome to The PIX Theatre of Greater Lapeer
data.text: Superhero Academy! Learn the secrets of the Hollywood stunt masters who teach actors how to fight and how to fly! Ring of Steel Action Theatre brings a couple of real, live-action stunt doubles to Pix so they can share with you how they bring the ACTION to life. You will learn and get to try your hand (fist!) at a little Hollywood-style fighting as well as be entertained by full-on superhero-level choreography! Come learn about movie magic!
